Name: Door of Destinies
Text: As Door of Destinies enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nWhenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, put a charge counter on Door of Destinies.\nCreatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each charge counter on Door of Destinies.

Name: Earwig Squad
Text: Prowl {2}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.)\nWhen Earwig Squad enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, search target opponent's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
